title: Pls help me to find out the font from this image
content:
I want to know name of the font for the text from this image. I want it for as much as possible text we can find.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907055433im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/JustinDuncan_4974.jpg)

 [‹ Gooch, blanch and hazel script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907055433/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44258 "Go to previous forum topic") [NECRI logo (Bodoni Poster and gothic sans?) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907055433/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44219 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content:
Can I know font for “Beach Island” & “new tazwell tennesse” which is under “rocket man........? I is important for me to find out...........  
Thanks for ur great help.”
